Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: William Carruth
Reviews.Content: Good, D5200 DX-Format Bronze Digital SLR Kit with 18-55mm VR Lens 2197 - 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR AF-S DX NIKKOR Lens for Nikon Digital SLR 32GB Secure Digital SD Memory Card Compact Deluxe Gadget Bag - DC74 ML-L3 Remote Control for  D90, D5100, D3100, D3200 58mm UV, Polarizer & FLD Deluxe Filter kit (set of 3 + carrying case) 60 Full Size  Photo / Video Tripod The New D5200Nikon is pleased to introduce the D5200 - a 24.1MP DX-format HD-SLR camera designed to draw exciting new perspectives out of everyone who shoots it. In addition, Nikon is also pleased to announce the WR-T10 and WR-R10 wireless remote controllers. Optimized for creativity, streamlined for flexibilityThe D5200's 3.0-inch super sharp Vari-angle LCD screen will provide unique perspectives for anyone shooting stills and recording Full HD video. With its newly developed 24.1 - megapixel DX-format CMOS sensor and EXPEED 3 image processing, your customers will also capture images with superior image quality filled with incredible detail, dynamic range and color
